channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description: I have been working at this server for DAYS. i canno't get the changing ip thing down, on my client. i change my ip in every sing .java folder their is and everytime i try to get on my server it says "error connecting to server" im running the server on one computer and trying to log on it with another. i've downloaded a new source and client and it still isnt working. i've made tons of posts on this website and nobody REPLIES. somebody help me please!

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

tann:

well, i done all of that except one thing. Compiling every time i compile i get this error. “javac is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue” and i have no clue on how to fix that. but if i do get it compiled will it let me connect threw other computers then?

Download and install JDK, set your enviroment variables, then go to Control Panel > Java > About: and check your version number (if you haven’t already) and then edit the compiler accordingly.

For example, if your JDK version is jdk1.6.0_21 and the compiler says jdk1.6.0_16, you just change the _16 to a _21.

Simples.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

ok checklist…

did you configure the client to connect to the right IP & PORT?

did you compile client and server?

are your ports open?

try logging into on the same cp ure running the server on.
